data.label: 腾讯云短视频 SDK
data.description: 腾讯云点播推出了短视频一站式解决方案，覆盖了视频生成、上传、处理、分发和播放在内的各个环节，帮助用户以最快速度实现短视频应用的上线。

data.label: 腾讯云短视频 SDK
data.description: Tencent Cloud VOD has launched a one-stop solution for short videos, covering all aspects of video generation, upload, processing, distribution, and playback, helping users to launch short video applications as quickly as possible.
